name: Greater Planar Mentor
text: Your mentor begins to look upon you as an equal and can even answer your call.
prerequisites: Improved Planar Mentor, Planar Mentor, character level 13th.
benefit:
You can benefit from your Planar Mentor feat one additional time per day. You add the following to the list of spell-like abilities you can cast using Improved Planar Mentor for their respective alignments, each of which affects only a single target within 30 feet: blasphemy (evil), dictum (lawful), holy word (good), slay living (neutral), and word of chaos (chaotic).

Once per week you can cast greater planar ally as a spell-like ability, but only to conjure your planar mentor. Your mentor requires only half the normal payment for its services.
text_zh: 你的导师开始把你视为平辈，并且甚至可以回应你的呼唤。
prerequisites_zh: 进阶位面训导、位面训导、角色等级13级。
benefit_zh:
你每天可以从你的位面训导专长中额外受益一次。你将以下内容添加到你可以使用进阶位面训导施放的类法术能力列表中，对应它们各自的阵营。每个能力只影响30英尺内的单个目标：渎神之语（邪恶）、律言（守序）、圣言（善良）、杀生术（中立）和混乱之言（混乱）。

每周一次你可以施展高等异界盟约作为类法术能力，但只能召唤你的位面导师，你的导师只需要为其服务支付一半的正常费用。
